article_title: As Value-Based Care Escalates, CVS Eclipses 50 Hospital Deals

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: CVS Health (CVS) said it has signed two new clinical affiliations with major regional medical centers in Chicago and Arizona as the giant retail pharmacy chain reaches across the country to health systems in preparation for the move away from fee-for-service medicine. Clinical affiliations between pharmacies owned by CVS, Walgreens Boots [...]
